message.body: Hey Liza do you have a sleeping bag?
Yeah! It is bright orange and doesn't zip that well but I have one
Could one of my freshman borrow it for the cp retreat? (They're both girls) I'm sure they would be happy to clean it after one of them used it.
Yeah! I'm not concerned about their cleaning it haha it's fine. When do you want it by?
Thanks so much! I think it's this weekend. But I will have to check. Ill text you when I know (and when I pick it up I can bring your bottle opener!)
They need it this Friday night -can I pick it up some time today?
When do you usually have dinner?
Sure. Maybe sometime between 1 and dinner?
Hmm I have class from 1-4 then aerobics from 4-5:30....
I can leave it outside my door
If you go at six I can run by and pick it up, but i don't want to die you down. Can you leave it in your common room?
One more thing about the sleeping bag: it takes considerable effort to get it back in the bag so if it doesn't fit and they give it back partially hanging out of the bag or whatever that's fine :P
